value: Palearctic, Asia: Asia Minor to Bangladesh
Dry grasslands and pastures; in native range, grasslands (primarily tall grass), scrubby and brushy areas, marshes and, locally, clearings in open forest.
range of well-watered habitats from alluvial riverbanks and tall grass to jungle/cultivation mosaics along canals & other watercourses & irrigated forest plantations;sea level to 2500m.

subcat_descr: Bill length (sex unknown) - Nares to tip

value: ground displays, but with occasional jumps/leaps into the air

subcat_descr: Number of breeding attempts per year

value: males and females share resources on their territory only during the breeding season
